## R Markdown

```{r}
convert_pounds_to_grams <- function(pounds = 1)
{grams <- 453.6 * pounds
return(grams)}
```

```{r}
convert_pounds_to_grams(pound = 10)
```

```{r}
get_mass_from_length_theropoda <- function(length, a, b)
{mass <- a * length ^ b
return(mass)}
```

#Error
get_mass_from_length_theropoda <- function(mass)
{mass <- a * length ^ b
return(mass)}

#Error
a = 214.44
b = 1.46
length <- 26
get_mass_from_length_theropoda()

```{r} 
get_mass_from_length_theropoda(length = 26, a =214.44, b = 1.46)
```
